refnamediv.refpurpose: an object containing an opaque chunk of data

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: gobject.GBoxed is an abstract base class that encapsulates an opaque chunk of data to provide an object-oriented interface and a type that is registered with the GLIB type system. A boxed type is registered with functions that provide for the copying and freeing of the underlying data structure - this allows PyGTK to encapsulate these as Python objects.

refsect2.title: gobject.GBoxed.copy

listitem.simpara: a copy of the gobject.GBoxed object

refsect2.para: The copy() method makes and returns a copy of the boxed object.
